description: This file contains utility functions for diagnostics and probing related to media endpoints, specifically for video and captions. It includes functions to verify server responses, analyze media playback capability, and the associated interface functions.

methods.name: normalizeBase(base)
methods.description: Normalizes the base URL by removing a trailing slash if present.

methods.name: fetchHead(url)
methods.description: Performs a HEAD request to the provided URL and returns response status, content type, and errors if any.

methods.name: fetchGet(url)
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the provided URL and returns response status, content type, and errors if any.

methods.name: runMediaEndpointDiagnostics(slug = 'quick-inbox-zero')
methods.description: Runs diagnostics on media endpoints (video and captions) for a given slug, checking server responses and content types.

methods.name: probeVideoPlayback(url, timeoutMs = 8000)
methods.description: Probes if a video URL can be played back in the browser by creating a hidden video element and listening for 'canplay' or 'error' events.
